page.title: 18FASHIONS
page.content: The present fashion in hair, both for men and women, is one of short styles often permed, flicked and dyed. However there are many variations within these definitions including shoulder length, short cut and even shaved. Hair is worn straight, in curls and worn up with grips and sprays. Many clothes are tight fitting with straight skirts and narrow ankled trousers in cotton, wool, and even leather. The summer clothes have been dominated by pastel shades. Shoes and short boots are popular in black, white, red and grey. Casual wear is often still denim jeans and jackets. Fashions however change rapidly with shorter skirts becoming popular whilst baggy clothes are on the way in.
